Package org.codehaus.cargo.module.application

Class ApplicationXmlIo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.cargo.module.AbstractDescriptorIo
      • org.codehaus.cargo.module.application.ApplicationXmlIo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DescriptorIo
    public final class ApplicationXmlIo
extends AbstractDescriptorIo
    Provides convenience methods for reading and writing enterprise application deployment descriptors (application.xml).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ApplicationXml parseApplicationXml​(InputStream input, EntityResolver entityResolver)
      Parses a deployment descriptor provided as input stream.

      Writes the specified document to a file.

      Writes the specified document to a file.
      static void writeApplicationXml​(ApplicationXml appXml, OutputStream output, Charset encoding, boolean isIndent)
      Writes the specified document to an output stream.

      • parseApplicationXmlFromFile

        public static ApplicationXml parseApplicationXmlFromFile​(File file,
                                                         EntityResolver entityResolver)
                                                  throws IOException,
                                                         org.jdom.JDOMException
        Parses a deployment descriptor stored in a regular file.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to parse
        entityResolver - A SAX entity resolver, or null to use the default
        Returns:
        The parsed descriptor
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs
        org.jdom.JDOMException - If the file could not be parsed

        IOException - If an I/O error occurs
